jd: From: shivam, winorbit shivam.s@winorbittech.com Reply to: shivam.s@winorbittech.com Position: Business Analyst (Blue Prism) Location: Schaumburg, IL MOI: Video Visa: No H1B and CPT This assignment is for 3 to 6 months and will be extended based on client confirmation. We need to prioritize in getting onsite BSA with Insurance background and Blueprism automation LinkedIn profile required We're seeking a strong and creative Business Analysts eager to solve challenging problems of scale and work on cutting edge technologies. In this project, you will have the opportunity to write code that will impact thousands of users every month. You'll implement your critical thinking and technical skills to develop cutting edge software, and you'll have the opportunity to interact with teams across disciplines. In Luxoft, our culture is one that strives on solving difficult problems focusing on product engineering based on hypothesis testing to empower people to come up with ideas. In this new adventure, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with a world-class team in the field of Insurance by building a holistic solution, interacting with multidisciplinary teams. Responsibilities Collaborate with the creative process by providing inputs based on your experience. Work with Product Owners and Business stakeholders in the requirements development. Drive the development team towards the goal by integrating skills and experiences. Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve the software. Work with QA, product management, and operations in an Agile environment. Develop and support data-driven product decisions in a high energy high-impact team. Develop features that will drive our business through real-time feedback loops. Participate in the resolution of production issues and lead efforts toward solutions. Design and implementation of cloud-based solutions to integrate different data sources. Work on event-driven architecture style Automate workflows and repetitive tasks on the cloud using serverless technologies. Develop small, independent, and loosely coupled microservices Work with event streaming and pub/sub messaging model Work with Web and mobile applications Skills Must have Experience in International Policy writing area with good analytical, communication and documentation skills Familiarity with Blue Prism automation tool to help on transforming their international policy system by automating the processes wherever possible.
